entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 38 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 49 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:45 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:45 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
